features.title: 1 BHK Apartment Options
features.description: Ideal for single professionals, students, or couples starting out. These units focus on smart, compact living spaces featuring modern kitchenettes, ample light, and superior finishes, making them excellent choices for rental investment or comfortable urban living without unnecessary overhead.

features.description: The most popular choice for small families, 2 BHK apartments in Sector 104 strike a perfect balance between space and affordability. locationsSection.title: Connectivity and Neighborhood Advantages Near Your Flat For Sale in Sector 104 Noida

The neighborhood surrounding Sector 104 is fully developed, offering top-tier social and retail infrastructure. Choosing a Flat For Sale in Sector 104 means investing in convenience, future growth, and unparalleled connectivity within the NCR.

faqSection.title: Common Questions About Buying a Flat For Sale in Sector 104 Noida
faqSection.description: Find detailed answers to the most frequent inquiries prospective buyers have regarding residential properties, investment potential, and legal compliance in Sector 104.

faqs.question: What are the typical price ranges for a 3 BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: The price range for a 3 BHK flat in Sector 104 can vary significantly based on the specific project, the age of the construction, the inclusion of luxury amenities, and the total super area. Generally, prices start from around INR 90 lakhs for mid-segment projects and can go upwards of INR 2 crores for premium, newly constructed luxury residences offering superior specifications and location advantages. It is essential to check the price per square foot which is currently stable and showing positive growth trends.

faqs.question: Is Sector 104 a good location for long-term real estate investment in Noida
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 104 is considered an excellent location for long-term real estate investment. Its proximity to the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, its well-developed social infrastructure, and its strong connectivity to major employment hubs like Sector 135 ensure sustained demand. Future appreciation is highly likely due to planned infrastructural upgrades and limited availability of land, making a Flat For Sale in Sector 104 a sound investment.

faqs.question: What types of residential projects are available in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: Sector 104 offers a diverse mix of residential options catering to various budgets and preferences. You will find everything from high-rise apartment complexes and gated residential communities to low-density housing and some exclusive builder floors. Both ready-to-move-in and under-construction projects are available, specializing in configurations ranging from 1 BHK studio flats to spacious 4 BHK luxury apartments and duplexes.

faqs.question: Are there any hidden costs associated with purchasing a Flat For Sale in Sector 104
faqs.answer: When purchasing a flat, buyers must account for several costs beyond the basic sale price. These typically include stamp duty and registration charges which vary by state law, Goods and Services Tax on under-construction property, Maintenance Security Deposit for the society, Internal Development Charges IDC, and club membership fees. Our team provides a transparent breakdown of all associated costs upfront to prevent any surprises during the final transaction stage.

faqs.question: How is the security and safety level in the residential societies of Sector 104
faqs.answer: The residential complexes in Sector 104 Noida prioritize resident safety. Most projects feature robust, multi-layered security systems including 24/7 CCTV surveillance across common areas, controlled gate access with boom barriers, and professional security personnel deployed throughout the premises. Furthermore, Sector 104 benefits from being a well-planned sector with efficient local police patrolling, contributing to overall neighborhood safety.

faqs.question: What essential amenities should I look for in projects offering Flat For Sale in Sector 104
faqs.answer: When evaluating flats, look for comprehensive amenities that enhance lifestyle and comfort. Standard modern amenities typically include a functional clubhouse, swimming pool, fully equipped gymnasium, dedicated children’s play area, power backup for common facilities, and high-speed elevator access. Premium projects often add features like concierge services, sports courts, pet zones, and extensive green landscaping.

faqs.question: Is financing readily available for buying property in Sector 104 Noida
faqs.answer: Yes, financing is readily available and highly streamlined for properties in Sector 104 Noida, especially those within RERA-approved projects. Most nationalized and private banks offer attractive home loan schemes with competitive interest rates. Our consultants can connect you with leading financial institutions to facilitate loan approvals and documentation, ensuring a smooth and timely disbursement process for your Flat For Sale in Sector 104.

faqs.question: What is the typical maintenance charge for a flat in Sector 104
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges in Sector 104 vary depending on the specific society and the level of amenities offered. Generally, maintenance fees are calculated based on the Super Area of the flat, typically ranging from INR 3 to INR 5 per square foot per month. This fee covers costs associated with common area lighting, security, waste management, landscaping, and the upkeep of amenities like swimming pools and clubhouses.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to finalize the purchase of a flat here
faqs.answer: Key documentation required includes a Sale Deed, Allotment Letter from the builder, Clearance Certificates No Objection Certificates from the society and local authority, Occupancy Certificate, Building Completion Certificate, and proof of payment of stamp duty and registration charges. For RERA projects, the buyer must also verify the builder’s RERA registration documents and the project's legal clearances. We assist clients in compiling and verifying all necessary paperwork.

faqs.question: How far is Sector 104 from the nearest major transportation hub or Metro Station
faqs.answer: Sector 104 enjoys favorable connectivity to existing and upcoming metro lines. The nearest operational metro stations are typically accessible within a 15 to 20 minute drive, linking residents directly to the DMRC network. Furthermore, the sector is strategically located close to the Noida-Greater Noida Expressway, providing rapid road transit to the Nizamuddin Railway Station and Indira Gandhi International Airport.
